text: Mohamed Amin Romdhana (; born 27 January 1993) is a Tunisian athlete specialising in the pole vault. He has won multiple medals at continental level, including three at African Championships and one at the African Games, and twice represented Africa at the Continental Cup. His personal bests in the event are 5.40 metres outdoors (Radés 2017) and 5.35 metres indoors (Niort 2017).
